content: That sounds like a great plan. For the potting station, I was thinking of setting up a small table with the pots, soil, and zinnia seedlings. I'll make sure to have some decorative stones and labels on hand for guests to personalize their pots. I'll also provide a simple guide with step-by-step instructions on how to pot the seedling. Do you think I should also offer some general care instructions for the zinnias, like how often to water them and how much sunlight they need?
